body:
Guys chill, its a fricken Pokemon doujin
If you dont like it, just leave - you dont need to justify anything to anyone
Well calm down a bit Mr.Butt-Hurt

@Dudeleon @megablade No, the real question you should be asking yourselves is, why are you here wasting your time in the comment section of doujin that you don't like? You could just as easily leave immediately after seeing what it is, or just use your blacklist. @megablade Saying that "It's because men are disgusting." is kind of a non sequitur, just because some men like things like this, doesn't mean all men are disgusting (it's also just your opinion).  It would be like me saying "Well I see a some women behave like morons, so that must mean that all women are completely fucking moronic.", see doesn't make sense does it, hypocrite.
Why are there so many doujins with women fucking animals?
The dog cock's are well illustrated...didn't expect that!
So is she gonna lay eggs?

Holy shit, a Sina doujin!

annnd it's bestiality...well, that's just how some Pokemon doujins are.
